H0.text: Who was the American historian who devised the Decimal System for classifying books, in 1876. Melvil

H1.text: Who was the American historian who devised the Decimal System for classifying books, in 1876. Charles Cutter

H2.text: Who was the American historian who devised the Decimal System for classifying books, in 1876. Thomas Edison

H3.text: Who was the American historian who devised the Decimal System for classifying books, in 1876. Deweyan

A4.text: Melvil Dewey invented the Dewey Decimal system of library classification.
